song.title: DascPop!
song.info:
4ch Protracker, 28kb original file size
Featured in the Amiga intro "0815-4711" by Paradise, released at Compusphere 2016 Amiga intro competition and in the same partysÂ´ chiptune competition.
Both versions had slightly different endings due to replayer issues. The version you hear is the "original" version as used for the Compo. In the intro, I had to remove the EFx command and included an alternate ending instead.
